summary: Service marketplace app with editable payment checkouts and Razorpay integration

existing_features.title: Add UI controls in the service marketplace (ServicesPage.tsx) to allow admins to configure Razorpay payment options for each service, similar to the existing payment link editing functionality
Create a ServiceRazorpayDialog component similar to ServicePaymentInfoDialog that allows editing Razorpay settings (enable/disable toggle, Razorpay key ID input) for a specific service
Display Razorpay payment option status in the service detail view (ServiceDetailPage.tsx) showing whether Razorpay is enabled and providing a button to edit Razorpay settings for admins
Extend the checkout flow in CheckoutPage.tsx to support Razorpay as an alternative payment method when services in cart have Razorpay enabled, displaying both Stripe and Razorpay options to users

new_feature_requests.summary: Add editable payment checkout options in service marketplace
Add Razorpay payment integration with editable options in service marketplace

Extend the Service type in backend/main.mo to include Razorpay-specific fields (razorpayEnabled: Bool, razorpayKeyId: ?Text, razorpayOrderId: ?Text) to support storing Razorpay payment configuration per service
Add backend methods (updateServiceRazorpay, getServiceRazorpayConfig) to manage Razorpay configuration for services with proper access control (admin-only)
